artist: Manufacturer: Royal Doulton Potteries; Decorator: F. Hancock
description: brown toned ground; decoration of waterlilies in brown and pink tones; gilt highlights; gilded scalloped edge
life_date: Burslem, Staffordshire, and Stoke-on-Trent, English, est. 1815
markings: on bottom: \'Daulton\'s\' impressed; \'Daulton Burslem\', in brown; \'Davis Collamore/New York\', in green; \'FH C.12\', in purple; on front: \'F. Hancock\', in purple, near edge
title: Dinner plate
